QuestData.Title: Timing Is Everything
QuestData.Description: Can you feel it, $n? The waters churn with approaching Sashj'tar.$B$BYou must strike now...$B$BLeave me... Find a way to bombard the naga... with the kegs...$B$BProtect... Jandvik...
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride an Azuregale Paddlefoot and kill 50 Sashj'tar naga using the Sealed Powder Kegs in Azuregale Bay.
QuestData.RewardText: Fjolrik died in honor of Jandvik. We will remember his bravery.
